Keywords: Robot , S.W.O.R.D.
Real Name: Vision
Special Powers
NATURALLY, THE SHIP OF THESEUS IS AN ARTIFACT IN A MUSEUM: Plasticity. // Adjacent opposing characters can't use improved abilities.
WANDA MAXIMOFF MUST BE NEUTRALIZED, YOU MUST BE DESTROYED: Flurry, Phasing/Teleport. When The Vision uses Phasing/Teleport, after resolutions it can use Flurry as FREE.
I AM VISION: Invincible, Super Senses, Willpower. Protected: Outwit.
I REQUEST ELABORATION: Outwit, Shape Change. When The Vision uses Shape Change and succeeds, after resolutions heal it 1 click.

June 22, 2022
Brundun94
Y'all just lucky common jlu Amazo didn't see the light of legit Modern play. It honestly seems like nobody bothered to read that character's card. He absolutely would have been errata'd, and possibly still could see some exploits in Silver. This dial is honestly underwhelming.
June 13, 2022
Oathful
Great offensive and defensive options throughout his long dial, I can see this guy very easily becoming the Blackheart of Robot teams. I would stay away from that 50pt line since it's a bit short even with his defensive powers, and highly recommend running Bloodaxe on him during Silver Age games for penetrating damage and even more sustain (at the cost of his ranged power). Icing on the cake is that when he does inevitably base someone, they aren't leaving easily without dealing with him. Thematic Dial: 8/10 Viability: 10/10 (200/100pt lines), 7/10 (50pt line) Fun Factor: 6/10, leans towards competitive.
May 30, 2022
Bigbear89
"This guy is straight up gunning for Amazos spot as best robot" @DarkTortoise23 I don't think Amazo ever had the spot to begin with...In any format or Age
May 7, 2022
Goop
200 is a pretty high cost but having flurry the entire dial makes up for it. Lots of powers on him keep him very hard to hit and tough to deal with. I think he's actually worth his value here at 200. All that flurry with defenses is just going to be brutal. I suspect the lower lines will see much more play though.
